name: IMMZ.DT.14 Yellow Fever
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give vaccine between age 9-12 months

action.title: Immunize Patient for Yellow Fever - No Doses
action.description: Provide Yellow Fever immunizations – using the "Yellow Fever vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Yellow Fever vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses and greater than or equal to 9 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Yellow Fever because no doses
